verses.1: Kihilh napi-in a mang nuam lote bawl phat zawh nawn loh dongin kisia ding uh hi.
verses.2: Midikte in gam a uk ciangin gam mite lungdam uh a, migilote in a uk ciangin a gam mite thum uh hi.
verses.3: Pilna a deih mi in a pa lungdamsak a, numei paktat tawh a kikhawl mi in a neihsa teng lawn mang hi.
verses.4: Thumanin a gamta kumpi in a gam kipsak a, sum bek a ngaihsun kumpi in a gam siasak hi.
verses.5: A man lopi-in mi khat mawk phatna pen a awk nadingin thangsiahna ahi hi.
verses.6: Migilote amau mawhna sungah awkcip a, midikte ahihleh suakta-in lungdam uh hi.
verses.7: Midikte in mi cimawhte ading thu khual uh a, migilote in tua bang thukhualna thei lo uh hi.
verses.8: Thu a khual lote in khua sungah buaina lianpi piangsak a, mipilte in tua buaina daisak thei hi.
verses.9: Mipil khat in mihai khat tawh zumah thu nei leh mipil pa tungah hehin zahko a, phattuamna piang tuan lo hi.
verses.10: Mi a that nuamte in a thuman mi mudah a, midikte in a thuman mi hu uh hi.
verses.11: Mihai pa a hehna bangin kam pau-in gamta gawp a, mipil pa ahihleh ki-ipin a hehna damsak hi.
verses.12: Kumpipa in zuau thu saangin na sem leh a nuai-a ulian khempeuh zong zuau genin ni tum ding uh hi.
verses.13: Mizawng pa le mi bawlsia pa a kibatna uh khat om hi. Topa in a nih tuakun mittang guan hi.
verses.14: Kumpipa in mizawngteʼ thu a manin khensak leh a ukna kip tawntung ding hi.
verses.15: Ciangduai le tai-na in pilna guan a, a kikhah khong ta in a nu maizumsak hi.
verses.16: Migilote ulian suak leh siatna khang semsem a, ahi zongin midikte in amauʼ mit mahmah tawh a gilo ulianteʼ zakiatna mu ding uh hi.
verses.17: Na ta thuhilhin tai lecin ama hangin na kipak dinga, na lung hong kimsak ding hi.
verses.18: Pasianʼ lamlahna a kizuih lohna gamah gam sung mite pheng tat gawp uh hi. Pasianʼ thukham a zui mite ahihleh a lungdam uh hi.
verses.19: Kam a hilh lel tawh silate pil zo lo a, a theih hangun hong mang tuan lo hi.
verses.20: Thu ngaihsun loin a pheng paupau mipa sangin mihai pa adingin lametna om zaw lai hi.
verses.21: Sila khat a neu tung a kipan limtakin na khoi hangin a tawpna ah nang hong hehsak veve ding hi.
verses.22: A heh pahpahte in kitotna piangsak a, a heh baihte khial thei tawntung hi.
verses.23: A kiphasakte in niamkhiatna thuak dinga, a kiniamkhiatte in pahtawina ngah ding hi.
verses.24: Guktaakna sungah a kipawl mipa ama adingin thusia zong pa ahi hi. A guktaakna pulak leh amah gim kipia dinga, gen khia kei leh lah Pasian in samsia veve ding hi.
verses.25: Midangte kihtakna in hong lunghimawhsak a, Topa muanna in hong lungmuangsak hi.
verses.26: Mi khempeuh in gam ukteʼ maipha ngah ding hanciam ciat uh a, ahi zongin Topaʼ kiang pan bekin thutang kingah hi.
verses.27: Midikte in migilote mudah uh a, migilote in midikte mudah uh hi.
